summary: This document is an email from an Australian lawyer to U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman and a Victim/Witness Coordinator, claiming to be a victim of Jeffrey Epstein's network and Prince Andrew. The sender provides information about formal submissions made to an Australian Royal Commission and requests to be added to the U.S. case against Epstein.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.role: United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Primary recipient of the email; the sender is urgently contacting him to report being a victim of Jeffrey Epstein's network and to provide evidence.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the case; the sender claims to be a victim of his global network and references the indictment against him.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Accused by the sender of involvement in commercial offenses via his Pitch @ Palace competition, with an active investigation by the UK Information Privacy Commissioner.

persons.name: Ronald Sackville
persons.role: Chair of The Royal Commission into Violence, Abuse, Neglect and Exploitation of People with Disability
persons.context: Australian official who has received the sender's formal submissions and is reviewing them; the sender has requested a meeting with him.

connections.description: The sender alleges both are part of a global network/circle involved in decades of rape and serious criminal offenses.
Berman is the U.S. Attorney prosecuting the case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).

events.title: Email sent to U.S. Attorney and media
events.description: The sender composes and sends an urgent email to Geoffrey Berman, a Victim/Witness Coordinator, and numerous media outlets, alleging victimization by Epstein's network and Prince Andrew.

events.title: Email forwarded to U.S. Attorney
events.description: The original email from March 9 is forwarded to Geoffrey Berman with additional context about attachments and prior submissions.

events.title: Submissions to Australian Royal Commission
events.description: The sender has filed over ten formal submissions with the Australian Royal Commission into Violence, Abuse, Neglect and Exploitation of People with Disability, which are being reviewed.

events.title: UK Information Privacy Commissioner investigation
events.description: An active investigation by the UK Information Privacy Commissioner into Prince Andrew and The Pitch @ Palace Team regarding stolen commercial information.

keyFacts: An Australian lawyer claims to be a victim of both sexual and commercial offenses perpetrated by Jeffrey Epstein's global network and Prince Andrew.
The sender has filed multiple formal submissions with the Australian Royal Commission into Violence, Abuse, Neglect and Exploitation of People with Disability, chaired by Ronald Sackville.
There is an active investigation by the UK Information Privacy Commissioner into Prince Andrew and The Pitch @ Palace Team for allegedly stealing the sender's commercial information.
The sender requests to be added to the U.S. case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein 19 Cr. 490 (RMB) and offers evidence from their submissions.
The email was sent to numerous media outlets in addition to U.S. legal authorities, indicating an attempt to publicize the allegations.
